Topic.Title: Is there a schema for aslx?

Posts.EditableText: I might start editing my Quest games outside the GUI, so I'm wondering if there's a schema document for aslx I can use to enhance my editor's XML editing.
Posts.HTML: I might start editing my Quest games outside the GUI, so I'm wondering if there's a schema document for aslx I can use to enhance my editor's XML editing.

Posts.EditableText: There's no schema as any XML element name might appear. e.g. an object can have attributes named whatever you like, and they all appear as XML elements.
Posts.HTML: There's no schema as any XML element name might appear. e.g. an object can have attributes named whatever you like, and they all appear as XML elements.

Posts.EditableText: Good point, I wonder if there are any kinds of schema that allow regex attribute names or something like that?
Posts.HTML: Good point, I wonder if there are any kinds of schema that allow regex attribute names or something like that?
